wordGroup: in all seriousness 严肃地；庄重地

sentences.en: I hope you realize the seriousness of this crime.
sentences.cn: 我希望你能认识到这一罪行的严重性。

sentences.en: Her voice was imbued with an unusual seriousness.
sentences.cn: 她的声音里充满着一种不寻常的严肃语气。

sentences.en: The seriousness of the crime cannot be overstated.
sentences.cn: 这一罪行的严重性怎么说也不为过。
